mapper.select: select pno, title, userid, oprice, sprice, category, CAST( 100 - ( cast(sprice as float) / cast(oprice as float) )*100 as decimal ) pricert, party, cpartied, CAST( ( cast(cpartied as float) / cast(party as float) )*100 as decimal ) partyrt, edate, DATEDIFF(edate, current_date) leftd from pdetail where party != cpartied and DATEDIFF(edate, current_date) >= 0 order by leftd limit 4;
select bno, title, regdate, views from notice order by bno desc limit 5
